alert.note: Alert for Eastern Pendleton; Western Grant; Western Mineral; Western Pendleton (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 29 at 6:22AM EST until January 30 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero, with the lowest readings on the ridges and in wind-exposed locations. * WHERE...Portions of western Maryland, western Virginia and eastern West Virginia. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes and result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Pendleton; Western Grant; Western Mineral; Western Pendleton
